name: Halls of Knowledge
description:
Welcome to your first day of University! Can you master all of the subjects and increase your ranking in the prestigious school that all of your heroes graduated from?! 

Controls:
Mouse to interact with menus
Escape to exit game

The game was made using Unity Game Engine, Krita, Blender, Post Processing Stack, Text Mesh Pro, and Pro Builder Free.

I apologize for the lack of audio. I was really determined to attempt something. I did actually try hammering stuff out in LMMS, but everything I made would have reduced the enjoyability of the game, so I leave the soundtrack up to you.
